participant_1.background:
I cook cheap but delicious food that my friends love and use my apple devices to keep my life organized.
my father use to drive a taxi cab in the 1970 s.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
i play jazz piano in a band.
i also dance and sing.

participant_2.background:
I prefer not to talk about my interests.
my mother passed away in 1979.
i like to swim in the lake.
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.

content.text: Hello there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim in the lake, and I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning.
That's great! I also enjoy swimming. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially enjoy jazz.
That's cool! I play jazz piano in a band.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
We play a variety of jazz standards, as well as some original compositions.
That sounds great! I'd love to hear you play sometime.
Sure! We're always looking for new venues to play at.
I'm sure you'd be a hit at the local coffee shop.
That's a great idea! We'll have to check it out.
I'm sure you'll be a big hit there.
